topic.title: Zero Talk is Censored
topic.body: Several posts redpill posted here were deleted

1_1FZEtMSz2tKFZPmBtjhD7JgR4awtAMD47G.body:
> [balancer73](#comment_6_1PniNzyi8fygvwyBaLpA9oBDVWZ5fXuJUw): Owner of ZeroTalk instance can modify any information of his instance.
> You can create clone of ZeroTalk and use it as you own instance.

Well the owner must be a sack of shit then
